user_query: I want to organize a charity event in a rural area and find a hotel with reliable cell coverage and movie recommendations.

TaskList.description: Research hotels in the specified rural area that can accommodate large groups.
Check the cell coverage quality for AT&T, T-Mobile, U.S. Cellular, and Verizon at the identified hotels.
Compile the hotels that meet the cell coverage and accommodation requirements.
Gather random movie recommendations suitable for entertainment during the charity event.
Create a final report with recommended hotels and movie suggestions.
